To the ladies

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Text on verso: To the ladies! We can confidently recommend this Supporter as far superior to anything of the kind in the market, for the following reasons: ... For sale by Loeb Brothers, Staunton, Va.
Image: two women, showing front and back views of the corset.
